channel.title: Diggnation

channel.itunes:keywords: alex albrecht, digg, digg.com, diggnation, kevin rose, revision3

item.title: The Gang Does RSA
item.description: Glenn, Prager and Barrett head to Moscone Center in San Francisco to check out the RSA Security Conference. They run into friend Joseph Menn an investigative security reporter for Reuters. After talking with Joe about the state of Internet security they meet up with Roy Zisapel the founder and CEO of the security company Radware. The gang ends up chatting with some booth babes to find out the meaning of RSA and got some SWAG.
item.content:encoded: Glenn, Prager and Barrett head to Moscone Center in San Francisco to check out the RSA Security Conference. The gang ends up chatting with some booth babes to find out the meaning of RSA and got some SWAG.

item.title: Visiting The Nobel Prize Winning Gladstone Institutes

item.title: The Boys Head to Burning Man!
item.description: Every September in Nevada's Black Rock, desert a temporary city comes together based on "radical self expression and self-reliance" called Burning Man. Incredibly, a functional airport also rises from the dust complete with FCC and Bureau of Land Management approval. This episode is all about that airport and Burning Man.

item.title: Dissecting Google Chrome with Ian Ellison Taylor
item.description: Prager visits the Google HQ to have a drink and talk to Ian Ellison-Taylor, the director of web platform. They discuss Chrome, and geek-out about Google's continuing plans to grow the power and offerings of their web products.
